name: Savers of the Oceans
description:
Ever wanted to play a platformer where you collect trash bags?

Okay, that's probably not the most appealing way to phrase it, so see it that way:

Jump from container to container, bouncing on dolphins, avoiding water and deadly birds all while collecting trash bags!

Not only that, each bag collected will be shared between ALL players in the world, and the more trash bags everyone collects, the better the game world will look.

From a moody green day to a beautiful summer afternoon, YOU can make the difference!

Small tips:

-Both WASD and ARROWS input can be used to move the cleaner around. Press SPACE to jump.

-If you press SPACE while in mid-air, the cleaner will glide with his bag, giving you more air-time.

-The starting platform will disappear after 6 seconds, so try not to stay on it for too long.

-While you cannot touch a bird's head as it will kill you, if you jump from under them, you can use them as a platform.

This game was made for the #TeamSeas association.

(Savers of the Oceans is set to release on Google Play as soon as Google validates it, so keep an eye out for that if you want to generate money for #TeamSeas by watching ads!)
